description: This file defines a React component for a web application's front-end page, specifically the index page of a Next.js project. It includes UI layout, styling, state management, and functions to handle form submissions for integrating with JIRA and Confluence, as well as utility components and CSS injection.

methods.name: submitJira
methods.description: Handles the form submission for saving JIRA integration credentials by sending a POST request to the backend API endpoint '/api/integrations/jira'.

methods.name: submitConfluence
methods.description: Handles the form submission for saving Confluence integration credentials by sending a POST request to the backend API endpoint '/api/integrations/confluence'.

methods.name: safeJson
methods.description: Safely parses a fetch Response object into JSON, returns empty object on error.

methods.name: GlobalStyle
methods.description: Injects global CSS styles into the document inside a <style> tag with a specified id, ensuring only one style tag exists and matches server/client CSS.

methods.name: SidebarItem
methods.description: A button component representing a sidebar navigation item, highlighting itself if active.

methods.name: FormField
methods.description: A reusable input field component with label, placeholder, and onChange handler.
